source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: The Hypnosis Masterclass
items.headline: A step by step Breakdown with Mentalist Ben Cale
objectives_summary: Understand the Basics (And the "advanced" stuff will suddenly start working).
Learn how to do a stage Hypnosis show.
Learn how to Hypnotise people for any purpose.

items.title: Top 10 Ways To Become A Great Communicator with Any Person

visible_instructors.title: Gil Cohen
visible_instructors.name: Gil
visible_instructors.job_title: BSc in Communication Systems and NLP Master

items.headline: Learn highly effective methods that will easily help you to connect, influence, understand and be understood by anyone
objectives_summary: By the end of this program you will know and be able to implement 10 effective communication techniques that will allow you to have excellent communication with anyone
You will know what others subjective language suggests about their thinking patterns and their representational systems, and how to communicate with them effectively

You will know how to influence your family, your spouse, your boss or potential boss , your date,  your friends, your girlfriend or boyfriend, your colleagues, clients, customers, patients or potential customers or clients, by using verbal and non verbal communications methods

items.title: Telling Stories is Attractive & The  Way To Sales Success!
items.headline: Indeed men who tell good stories are more attractive and that this truth can help men & women  to attract good business
objectives_summary: To know how to check out the truth of the title, Men who tell good stories are more attractive, and decide what that means to you an your business.
You will know that you must become a better storyteller if you want to be a successful entrepreneur.
You will know how to start building your storytelling skills for greater influence and impact.

items.title: Critical Thinking: Improve Reasoning & Communication Skills
items.headline: Basic guide for the development of critical thinking skills focused on argumentation
objectives_summary: Detect poor reasoning strategies
Detect hidden and false assumptions in yourself and others
Identify valid and sound arguments

items.title: Voice Warm-Up for Actors & Voice-Over Artists
items.headline: No other course like it. It's your COMPLETE voice warm up program! Very practical & hands on. Everything you need & more
objectives_summary: Warm up your voice safely
Have a go-to voice warm up for the rest of your career
Have greater command over your voice

items.title: Goal Setting Mastery

visible_instructors.title: Lokesh Kumar Lakhotia - NetEdu Academy
visible_instructors.name: Lokesh Kumar Lakhotia -
visible_instructors.job_title: A Edu-Tech org. focused to provide quality educational sol.

items.headline: Mastering the art of setting & achieving your goals.
objectives_summary: W&H Formula to understand the important aspect of your life
Identification & Prioritization of Goals
Convert GOALS into SMART GOALS

items.title: The Art of Influencing People

visible_instructors.title: Harjas Singh
visible_instructors.name: Harjas
visible_instructors.job_title: Author | TEDx Speaker | Life Skills Educator

items.headline: 21 Principles of influencing people, persuasion psychology, and improving your relationships.
objectives_summary: How to win people to your way of thinking
How to get smooth cooperation in group projects
How to build the initial rapport

items.title: How to influence as an ADVOCATE
items.headline: Master the art of being an change agent in the political arena, community, or workplace.
objectives_summary: Influence decision makers to support their cause, issue or initiative
Use advocacy techniques to create a social or political movement
Choose which types of advocacy are appropriate for given situation

items.title: Christian Public Speaking
items.headline: Design and Deliver a Dynamite Talk
objectives_summary: How to design and deliver a dynamite talk!

items.title: The Comprehensive Guidelines for Effective Communication
items.headline: Enhance your communication skills, become assertive and provide constructive feedback
objectives_summary: Discover the communicating and responding barriers that compromise your relationships
Learn how to provide healthy feedback while avoiding defensiveness
Learn to stand up for yourself and your needs by becoming assertive

items.title: Effective Voice Projection and Vocal Variety

visible_instructors.title: Stewart Theobald
visible_instructors.name: Stewart
visible_instructors.job_title: Head trainer at Talking Shop Training Ltd.

items.headline: Voice training to discover your true voice and engage any audience with power and presence.
objectives_summary: You will learn techniques studied by actors to increase the volume of your voice.
You will understand how to preserve your voice and prevent discomfort when speaking for long periods.
You will learn techniques for effective breath control.

items.title: BODY LANGUAGE: Discover Body Language Secrets
items.headline: Master body language for success ,interpret body language of others,perfect your own nonverbal communication
objectives_summary: How to read body language
Body language for men
Master your nonverbal communication

items.title: Leadership Authority - Leadership skills and development
items.headline: Great Skills for you to learn.
objectives_summary: Leadership Skills
How to be a leader
How to be bold

items.title: How To Write Like Malcolm Gladwell Series Vol 2.0

visible_instructors.title: Martin Kenny
visible_instructors.name: Martin
visible_instructors.job_title: Author of "Malibu Code: Learn HTML, CSS and JavaScript"

items.headline: The most comprehensive guide to revealing Gladwellian patterns of describing people, wrtiing introductions + using facts
objectives_summary: Write an introduction like Malcolm Gladwell
Describe a person like Malcolm Gladwell
Use statistics and facts like Malcolm Gladwell

items.title: Persuasion Mastery: How To Persuade & Influence Anyone
items.headline: Guarantee: By the end of this course you will learn how to persuade & influence anyone in any social situation.
objectives_summary: You will learn the essentials of persuasion.
You will learn what to say and how to say it in order to not come across slimy or doubtful.
You will learn what is required in making a believer in your intended target.

items.title: Basic Magic Handlings for Beginners - The Starter Course
items.headline: Using Magic to Learn Life Skills
objectives_summary: After this course, the students will be able to manipulate the basic building blocks of magic (misdirection, holding out, loading, false takes, productions, vanishes, angles and practice).
You will have acquired knowledge to be able to practice, develop and perform basic tricks and will be able to apply that knowledge in everyday life.
Self working tricks, complete handlings with coins and psychological subtleties will be at the student's grasp along with complete tutorials of magic tricks you can do at home right now.
